titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide that the exclusion for qualified scholarships shall apply to allowances for room, board, and special needs services.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
12/13/2007--Introduced.
Amends the Internal Revenue Code to include within the exclusion from gross income for qualified scholarship amounts allowances for room, board, and special needs services at institutions of higher education.
